snippet.textDisplay: The Axem Rangers are difficult... I took out the black, pink, green, yellow, then red in that order. The yellow was by far the hardest since he keeps using body slam as a counterattack!!
snippet.textOriginal: The Axem Rangers are difficult... I took out the black, pink, green, yellow, then red in that order. The yellow was by far the hardest since he keeps using body slam as a counterattack!!

snippet.textDisplay: Ah the Axem Rangers...that battle marked the FIRST time i gave up on a game for a little while because of the difficulty...good times indeed.
snippet.textOriginal: Ah the Axem Rangers...that battle marked the FIRST time i gave up on a game for a little while because of the difficulty...good times indeed.

snippet.textDisplay: @duckypwns This was far to simplistic a game for it to be independent of a big name. Don't get me wrong, I love the Hell out of it. I just don't think I would've exercised my interest had it not had my favorite overall-wearing plumber.
snippet.textOriginal: @duckypwns This was far to simplistic a game for it to be independent of a big name. Don't get me wrong, I love the Hell out of it. I just don't think I would've exercised my interest had it not had my favorite overall-wearing plumber.

snippet.textDisplay:
Oooh...

This really throws me back to when I was still small enough to sit under the table to play my SNES with the smell of supper being cooked in the background...

I really struggled against Bowyer as a kid, and I remember hearing that tune over and over again for about 4 or 5 evenings of trying to beat him before supper was ready.

It's a little odd for this precise memory to come back to me now, but it's the first thing I think of when hearing this. =)

STATIC E!
snippet.textOriginal:
Oooh...

This really throws me back to when I was still small enough to sit under the table to play my SNES with the smell of supper being cooked in the background...

I really struggled against Bowyer as a kid, and I remember hearing that tune over and over again for about 4 or 5 evenings of trying to beat him before supper was ready.

It's a little odd for this precise memory to come back to me now, but it's the first thing I think of when hearing this. =)

STATIC E!

snippet.textDisplay:
Finally played through this game a few weeks ago on VC. Really nice game, but I prefer Paper Mario: The thousand-year door over this one. It had a much more complex and refined battle system and the different worlds were just more fun.
Just my opinion ;)

Nevertheless a great game with great music!
snippet.textOriginal:
Finally played through this game a few weeks ago on VC. Really nice game, but I prefer Paper Mario: The thousand-year door over this one. It had a much more complex and refined battle system and the different worlds were just more fun.
Just my opinion ;)

Nevertheless a great game with great music!

The masterpiece in its integrity!
